code: protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     return createSpringCamelContext(this, "org/apache/camel/spring/processor/interceptSendToEndpointWhen.xml"). }

@Test public void testInterceptEndpointWhen() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:bar").expectedBodiesReceived("Hello World", "Hi").     getMockEndpoint("mock:detour").expectedBodiesReceived("Hello World").     getMockEndpoint("mock:foo").expectedBodiesReceived("Bye World", "Hi").     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedBodiesReceived("Bye World", "Hi").     template.sendBody("direct:second", "Hello World").     template.sendBody("direct:second", "Hi").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
